title: A Stranger's Heart
description: Corinne Morgan had survived hell and had the scars to prove it. Her career and life were moving full throttle when a stranger stepped in and gave a reason to want even more. Jake Shaw had only one desire to be a good father to his son but now an unexpected meeting reignites his desire for love and family. But will Corinneâ€™s past be the wedge that drives them apart? Can she find the courage to let Jake help her fight the demons that threaten their love and future? Will Jake survive the demons and still want her?**Not suitable for young readers...Adult content**
author: T.K. Tuitt
